CustomField.formula: IF( (LimitsAsyncCallsUsed__c / LimitsAsyncCallsMax__c * 100) >= 90, "⛔", IF( (LimitsAsyncCallsUsed__c / LimitsAsyncCallsMax__c * 100) < 90 && (LimitsAsyncCallsUsed__c / LimitsAsyncCallsMax__c * 100) >= 80, "⚠️", "✅" ) ) + ' ' + TEXT(ROUND(LimitsAsyncCallsUsed__c / LimitsAsyncCallsMax__c * 100, 2)) + '% (' + TEXT(LimitsAsyncCallsUsed__c) + ' / ' + TEXT(LimitsAsyncCallsMax__c) + ')'
CustomField.inlineHelpText: ✅ when 80% or less of the limit is used, ⚠️ when 80.1-89.9% is used, or ⛔ when 90% or more is used
CustomField.label: Async Calls
